kobuki_driver Documentation

kobuki_driver

C++ driver library for Kobuki: Pure C++ driver library for Kobuki. This is for those who do not wish to use ROS on their systems.

  • Homepage: http://wiki.ros.org/kobuki_driver

We are currently only supporting english documentation. If you'd like to translate, feel free to modify the source and make a pull request.

  • English Guides

If you find any problems with this documentation, please submit issues to the kobuki_core issue tracker.
